sentences.english: Silver-headed men sit around kerosene heaters.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭銀髮的男人圍坐在煤油暖氣機。

sentences.english: He is an elderly gentleman, silver-haired, with a twinkle in his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位上了年紀的紳士，滿頭銀髮，兩眼炯炯有神。

sentences.english: Standing up, he saw his mother gazing at him from under her dishevelled white hair.
sentences.chinese: 他站起來，看見媽媽的眼睛在紛亂的銀髮下望着他。

sentences.english: Is it true the arsenic blackens silver?
Introducing the theories and researches of elderly leisure education.
sentences.chinese: 介紹銀髮族休閒教育之相關理論與研究。

sentences.english: Their big break came when they discovered a trail of white register tape.
sentences.chinese: 案件的重大轉機出現在他們發現了一溜白色收銀髮票。

sentences.english: Her grandfather was clean-shaven, with a full head of white hair.
sentences.chinese: 她的外祖父鬍子刮的很乾淨，滿頭銀髮。

sentences.english: With multifunctional sticks in hand, the silver-haired noBles can show their outstanding manners.
sentences.chinese: 手持多功能柺杖，令銀髮貴族風度非凡。

sentences.english: The experience of graying Japan over the past couple of decades is one that Chinese leaders surely want to avoid.
sentences.chinese: 中國領導人肯定不願重蹈過去幾十年銀髮日本的教訓。

sentences.english: Now they have silvered into grand old men.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們已變成滿頭銀髮的老人了。

sentences.english: Learning the theories of elderly leisure education.
sentences.chinese: 學習銀髮族休閒教育之相關理論。

sentences.english: I see a lot of silver foxes out there today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天看到好多魅力銀髮熟男。

sentences.english: At the front desk, a man with silvery hair stands with a pigeon on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 而前臺那，一銀髮男子站立着，一鴿子站在他的肩上。

definition: golden years (after the age of about 60)
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
assistive device (walking frame, hearing aid etc)
to get together all at once
proletariat/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4] plus masses/also written 無產階級|无产阶级[wu2 chan3 jie1 ji2] in PRC Marxist theory
brimming with enthusiasm (idiom); full of warmth
Taoyuan city in north Taiwan, capital of Taoyuan county
